backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a job marketplace with candidate profiles, job postings, applications, and role-based access control. Includes CRUD operations for jobs, candidates, applications, and user profile management with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the removal of 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution from the Footer component, listing affected files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary of four frontend components: CandidateProfileForm (profile creation/editing), JobRecommendations (personalized job matching), CandidateProfileView (read-only profile display), and Footer (copyright display).
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements like backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Autohire application with a root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component configuring TanStack Router with routes for employer/candidate dashboards, job postings, applications, and profile pages. Includes ThemeProvider, authentication check, and UserProfileSetup modal.
Form component for submitting job applications with optional fields for expected salary, cover letter, and resume URL. Validates candidate profile existence before submission.
Displays list of job applications with status badges, candidate/job info based on user role, and employer-only status update dropdown. Shows application details like cover letter and resume links.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Authentication wrapper component that checks user login status and optional role requirements, displaying login prompt or access denied message when conditions aren't met.
frontend/src/components/CandidateProfile: Form component for creating/editing candidate profiles with fields for personal info, skills, location, hourly rate, portfolio links, availability, and preferred job types. Handles form submission via useSaveCandidateProfile hook and displays toast notifications.

Read-only display component for candidate profiles showing personal details, availability status, skills, preferred job types, portfolio links, and resume. Uses Card components to organize information into sections.
Search and filter component with a search input field and optional employment type dropdown selector. Accepts callbacks for search term and type filter changes.
frontend/src/components/EmployerJobPosti: Card component displaying job posting details for employers with edit/delete actions, application count, and navigation to view applications. Includes confirmation dialog for deletion.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty state component displaying an image, title, description, and optional action button for when no data is available.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright information with the current year and company name.
frontend/src/components/FreelanceJobCard: Card component for displaying freelance job postings with project details, salary range, skills, and an apply button that opens ApplicationForm in a dialog. Styled with primary theme colors.
frontend/src/components/JobCard.tsx: Card component for displaying regular job postings with employment type, company info, salary range, skills, application deadline, and an apply button that opens ApplicationForm in a dialog.
frontend/src/components/JobPostingForm.t: Form component for creating and editing job postings with fields for title, company, location, salary, skills, and other job details. Handles submission via create/update mutations and displays success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/JobRecommendatio: Displays personalized job recommendations for candidates by filtering active jobs based on their skills and preferred job types. Shows up to 6 matching jobs in a grid layout.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps the app with Navigation header, main content outlet, and Footer. Provides consistent page structure across routes.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states. Clears query cache on logout and handles authentication errors.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Main navigation header with role-based menu links for employers and candidates, mobile sheet menu, and LoginButton. Shows different navigation options based on user authentication and role.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and select a role (employer or candidate). Cannot be dismissed until profile is created.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Invalidates dependent queries when actor changes and initializes access control with admin token.
frontend/src/hooks/useApplications.ts: Provides React Query hooks for job application operations: applying to jobs, fetching job applications, fetching user applications, and updating application status. All mutations invalidate relevant queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCandidateProfile.t: Provides hooks for fetching the caller's candidate profile and saving/updating candidate profile data including personal info, skills, experience, education, and preferences. Invalidates profile queries on successful save.
frontend/src/hooks/useCandidates.ts: Provides hooks for filtering candidates by skills and experience level, and fetching individual candidate profiles by user ID using Principal conversion.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and context provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPostings.ts: React Query hooks for job posting CRUD operations (get, create, update, delete) that interact with the backend actor and manage cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile, with automatic cache invalidation on updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for a warm, professional color palette (teal primary), dark mode support, typography enhancements, and custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CandidateBrowse.tsx: Job browsing page for candidates with search and filter functionality, displaying active job postings in a card grid layout with empty state handling.
frontend/src/pages/CandidateDashboard.ts: Candidate dashboard showing application statistics, profile completion status, and personalized job recommendations with quick action buttons.
frontend/src/pages/CandidateProfile.tsx: Candidate profile management page with view/edit modes, allowing users to create or update their professional profile information.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerDashboard.tsx: Employer dashboard displaying job posting statistics, active listings, and quick actions for managing postings and searching candidates.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerJobPostings.t: Employer dashboard page for managing job postings with create/edit functionality via a dialog form. Filters job postings by employer identity and displays them in a grid with empty state handling.
Public marketplace page displaying freelance and contract job opportunities with search filtering. Shows active jobs filtered by employment type in a card grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with hero section and feature cards showcasing the platform's capabilities. Auto-redirects authenticated users to their role-specific dashboard (employer or candidate).
frontend/src/pages/JobApplications.tsx: Employer-only page showing all applications for a specific job posting. Validates job ownership and displays application list with job details card.
frontend/src/pages/MyApplications.tsx: Candidate-only page displaying all job applications submitted by the logged-in user. Shows application status tracking with empty state and navigation to job browsing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and persisting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing. Includes sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens using OKLCH color space, extended theme with container settings, custom animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file for Autohire platform tracking 8 implemented features including job posting system, candidate profiles, application management, freelancing marketplace, and dashboards for both employers and candidates. Currently at version 5 with no known issues or pending fix requests.
